alert.note: Alert for Kingman (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 4:12AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Kingman County through 445 AM CDT... At 412 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Kingman, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Kingman, Murdock, Waterloo, Cleveland, Penalosa and Kingman Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
